thread.title: ezACH Deposit Software Updates Include A Feature To Speed Up Bulk Online Transactions
thread.title_full: ezACH Deposit Software Updates Include A Feature To Speed Up Bulk Online Transactions

author: Tammie Bernard
title: ezACH Deposit Software Updates Include A Feature To Speed Up Bulk Online Transactions
text:
ezACH direct deposit software from Halfpricesoft.com has been enhanced with new data import feature to speed up bulk online transfers for small to midsize businesses. With the recent update, customers no longer have to wait long for transactions to be posted. “ezACH direct deposit has been updated to speed up bulk online transactions, per customer requests," Halfpricesoft.com founder, Dr. Ge says.
EzACH Deposit Software — affordable direct paycheck deposit for any business — free 30-day trial. EzACH is priced at just $199 one time fee, per installation. With the purchase of a license key, customers can unlock ezACH Deposit Software for unlimited use. The free download and the license key can be found online at http://www.halfpricesoft.com/NACHA-ACH-direct-deposit-software.asp .
Unique features of ezACH Deposit Software:
ezACH deposit generates NACHA ACH files for electronic fund transfers ezACH Deposit supports multiple bank origination account Supports ARC, CCD, CCD+, POP, PPD, RCK, TEL, WEB SEC type. Easily update ABA Bank routing number database EzACH allows importing to vendors and transactions from files, ezPaycheck payroll software, ezCheckPrinting software and other sources EzACH deposit can support multiple accounts at no extra charge Quick data import feature Form level help buttons have been added to make the software even easier to use Allows payments to government taxes and vendors Allows customers to collect funds from clients Customer’s concerned with the environment can go green with ezACH electronic payments ACH processes all credits and debits from a particular bank in one batch
No more hassle dealing with paper deposits. To start this 30 day test drive, visit http://www.halfpricesoft.com/NACHA-ACH-direct-deposit-software.asp
About Halfpricesoft.com
Halfpricesoft.com is a leading provider of small business software, including payroll software, employee attendance tracking software, accounting software, check printing software, W2 software, 1099 software, and barcode generating software. Today Software from halfpricesoft.com is trusted by thousands of users and help small business owners simplify their payroll processing and business management.
